title: Arrr Waterless Bubble Cleanser/Waterless Cleanser for Dogs, Cats, for Pets, No Rinse Formula
features: NO WATER REQUIRED: It is a formula that requires no water and convenient for use. Out waterless bubble cleanser helps to remove dirt on the skin, with the use of non-sensitive fragrance and other mild ingredients to protect the well-being of your dogs, puppies, cats or kittens.

EASY TO CLEAN: This product comes with a brush for the cleaning process. It is made with soft bristles that are gentle to the skin. You may use it to clean the paws of your pets after bringing them outdoors.

LOW-IRRITATING INGREDIENTS: This hypoallergenic cleanser is specially formulated with ingredients that will not irritate the skin of your pets. Coconut contains Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate that is beneficial to the skin.

SAFE INGREDIENTS: It doesn’t contain any harmful ingredients such as preservatives. -Sulfate Free, Silicone Free, PEG Free, Mineral oil Free, Animal-derived ingredients Free, Synthetic pigment Free, Triethanolamine Free, MIT/CMIT Free-
SUITABLE FOR pets who enjoy outdoor activities frequently, don’t like baths, require only partial cleaning, and also ideal for after surgery or after their toilet time.
